name: Bloodstone Sentinel
description: The Bloodstone Sentinel is a large construct known for its unique ability to manipulate bloodshed and cause chaos, featuring a robust design reflecting its durability and strength.
memorable: Its ability to absorb blood and enhance its power makes it a notably dangerous foe on the battlefield.
goals: To cause chaos and disruption among enemies while supporting allies.
relations: Could be encountered with other constructs or creatures that engage in blood-related abilities.
environment: Typically found in areas where bloodshed occurs or near battlefields.
strengths: Immunities to poison and nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage, as well as multiple condition immunities.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity, resulting in poor agility.
attacks: The Bloodstone Sentinel can make two claw attacks in a single turn, dealing significant slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Blood Lure allows it to punish nearby creatures when they take damage, amplifying its own power.
additional_information: Can provide advantages to allies and disrupt enemies using its Blood Reservoir abilities.
Absorbs blood that is spilled nearby to fuel its powers.
Notable for causing chaos among enemy ranks with its Inspire Fury ability.
